content: Hi there. My dad is in the National GUard, and people on this website: http://zonebbs.com/boards.php?t=19904 are talking a whole bunch of uneducated crap about our military and it really makes me angry. Could you guys help me educate them somehow? I love my Dad so much and want to fight for what he and all of you awesome service members do for our country.

title: Could You Guys Please Help Me Straighten Out These People?
